# Spinner

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                     | Type                           | Default      |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------ |
| `size`    | `size`    | Size of spinner. Accepted strings are: xs, sm, md and lg.       | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"` | `'lg'`       |
| `variant` | `variant` | Variant of spinner. Accepted strings are: standard and inverted | `"inverted" \| "standard"`     | `'standard'` |
